name: City Firefighter Missions
description:
City Firefighter Missions

Here is the secret heroes. Firefighters walk on fire without fear. Because city's needs them. City firefighter missions is the best 3d third person firefighter game.

Are you ready for hard missions? Rescue people from the fire. Emergency locations will present a challenge of blazing disasters. Grab your hose, race to save lives, and display the courage of a real firefighter.

Realistic Firefighting equipment
Realistic rescue missions
Realistic Fire Truck
Drive Fire Truck
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
